messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

oracle not tuesday pm re update setup hi items please change st july st appears thanks friday pm update setup dear further recent communication believe query has resolved resolution response please let further assistance matter reference number summary setup resolver resolution notes re setup thank galaxy date re setup thanks hi created please let further assistance needed kind regards analyst re setup approved thanks re setup synchronization problem client imported fixed client present approved please approve create under thank kind regards analyst re setup thank clarifications client looks re issues because come going investigate let ready approve kind regards analyst re setup client yet re setup hi believe referring please snapshot going fwd please input name client form thank regards friday pm re setup hi link contains contract under client maybe right client under which created please note created within existing approved clients thank looking forward hearing kind regards analyst re setup hi client defined opportunity client yet thanks description thursday setup hi please setup attached coordinates thanks head ext mob kind regards ext ref msg
